name: Cubes In Danger 3 (Games by Robert Dolega)
name_original: Cubes In Danger 3 (Games by Robert Dolega)
description:
Pick your Cubes and try to survive in every cubic and electric world!

Run through non-stopping board, avoid spiky little things, collect some cool stuffs, and open the Rainbow Portal to another cubic and electric world! But it's not that simple! You will need your best friend to accompany you in this great adventure! 

The further you are, the harder it is! Enjoy 10 wonderfully designed boards with special soundtracks composed right for it! 2 PLAYERS REQUIRED! OR NOT REQUIRED IF YOU GOT THE SKILL!
